lead_paragraph: The police said the 39-year-old man, armed with a gun, was confronted by a sergeant outside a home in Gravesend before the sergeant and another officer opened fire.

byline.original: By RICK ROJAS and NOAH REMNICK

headline.print_headline: Officers Kill Man After Break-In Is Reported
headline.main: Man Killed by Officers Responding to Report of Home Invasion in Brooklyn

snippet: The police said the 39-year-old man, armed with a gun, was confronted by a sergeant outside a home in Gravesend before the sergeant and another officer opened fire....
abstract: New York City police officers fatally shoot man fleeing scene of home invasion in Gravesend, Brooklyn; are seeking second suspect in crime.
